gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 113, Bulls 101
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hawks defeated the Bulls, 113-101. Bogdan Bogdanovic recorded 20 points, six assists, and four rebounds for the Hawks, with Vit Krejci adding 18 points, a career-high six 3PM (6-6), and four rebounds in the victory. DeMar DeRozan tallied 31 points, five assists, and two rebounds for the Bulls in the losing effort. The Hawks improve to 35-40, while the Bulls fall to 36-40.
